metadata.synopsis: The player interacts with a zombie in the necromancer's lab,
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Use ReCon command "oe Necromancer_Assault"- Use command "roll amazing".- Enter the Necromancer Chamber, talk to the Necromancer and talk your way out of it with a skill roll.- Talk to one of the zombies.

0.speaker: Cal, Danis, Dror Ragzlin, GROUP_Act2_COL_NecromancerZombies, Lakrissa, Lia, Nickels, Nightwarden Minthara, Nimble, Wulbren Bongle
